name: Cataclysmia
description:
Cataclysmia is a god game where you are tasked with destroying civilization.

The player has two abilities at their command, a meteor and a lightning storm.

The meteor can kill citizens, destroy buildings and restores some energy.

The storm destroys buildings, trees and crops.

Each ability costs some energy to cast and energy recharges slowly over time.

Controls:

Mouse: Use Power.

W/S: Rotate planet.
